content: Enhance database schema with new tables for interactive textbook content
Create lessons table with rich text content and embedded prompts
Add user scenario customization system for personalized learning
Create prompts table for copy-paste templates organized by platform
Create quizzes table with questions, answers, and explanations
Create tasks table with completion tracking and validation
Create setup script to apply all new schemas and seed all content
Update claude.md with new interactive textbook approach
Complete Level 1 content - add remaining 8 lessons to reach 16 total
Add remaining prompts to reach 50+ total
Add remaining quizzes and tasks for complete Level 1
Update setup script to include all new content
Create API endpoints for new interactive content
Create final testing and validation script
Create comprehensive README for the interactive textbook system
